author: Manoj Chandra
text: U r working on smtg for months& yk that u can do it no matter ppl say. Bt the moment ur fav person, a person who inspires u, motivates u, says that u r not even that good at it, u actually start believing that u actually cant do it& u start to doubt urself& u get even worse at it

author: Manoj Chandra
text:
Read it somewhere "How do introverts make friends? They don't! 
Extroverts find them and adopt them."
Someone please find me and adopt me 😭
